CustomField.description: Duration Unit will define the measure of the value in Duration field. If Hours is selected, the value of 2 in Duration field will mean the Session is for 2 Hours. If Minutes is selected, the value of 45 in Duration field will mean the Session is for 45 Minutes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for defining duration for a Session. If Hours is selected, a value of 2 in Duration field will mean the Session is for 2 Hours. If Minutes is selected, a value of 45 in Duration field will mean the Session is for 45 Minutes.
CustomField.label: Duration Unit
